content:
<ce:table colsep="0" frame="topbot" id="TBL1" rowsep="0" xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/cals/dtd">
<ce:label>Table 1</ce:label>
<ce:caption>
<ce:simple-para view="all">Crystal data, data collection and structure refinement parameters for <ce:bold>1</ce:bold> and <ce:bold>2</ce:bold>
</ce:simple-para>
</ce:caption>
<tgroup cols="3">
<colspec colname="col1" colsep="0"></colspec>
<colspec colname="col2" colsep="0"></colspec>
<colspec colname="col3" colsep="0"></colspec>
<thead>
<row rowsep="1">
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Compound</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">[HgI<inf loc="post">2</inf>(tmp)]<inf loc="post">
<italic>n</italic>
</inf> (<bold>1</bold>)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">[HgI<inf loc="post">2</inf>(azobpy)]<inf loc="post">
<italic>n</italic>
</inf> (<bold>2</bold>)</entry>
</row>
</thead>
<tbody>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Formula</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">C<inf loc="post">13</inf>H<inf loc="post">14</inf>HgI<inf loc="post">2</inf>N<inf loc="post">2</inf>
</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">C<inf loc="post">10</inf>H<inf loc="post">8</inf>HgI<inf loc="post">2</inf>N<inf loc="post">4</inf>
</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Formula weight</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">652.65</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">638.59</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Temperature (K)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">293(2)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">291(2)</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Crystal system</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">monoclinic</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">orthorhombic</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Space group</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>P</italic>2<inf loc="post">1</inf>
</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>Pnma</italic>
</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>a</italic> (Å)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">5.0811(10)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">8.581(2)</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>b</italic> (Å)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">13.412(3)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">13.943(3)</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>c</italic> (Å)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">12.121(2)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">11.954(2)</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>a</italic> (°)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">90</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">90</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>β</italic> (°)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">90.21(3)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">90</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>γ</italic> (°)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">90</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">90</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>V</italic> (Å<sup loc="post">3</sup>)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">826.0(3)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">1430.3(5)</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>Z</italic>
</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">2</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">4</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>ρ</italic>
<inf loc="post">calc</inf> (Mg<hsp sp="0.25"></hsp>m<sup loc="post">−3</sup>)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">2.624</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">2.966</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>μ</italic> (mm<sup loc="post">−1</sup>)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">13.040</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">15.062</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>F</italic>(0<hsp sp="0.25"></hsp>0<hsp sp="0.25"></hsp>0)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">584</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">1128</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Crystal size (mm)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">0.22×0.18×0.16</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">0.28×0.20×0.17</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Crystal color</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">yellow</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">red</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Diffractometer</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">R-axis-IV</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">R-axis-IV</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>λ</italic> (Mo Kα) (Å)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">0.71073</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">0.71073</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">2<italic>θ</italic>
<inf loc="post">max</inf> (°)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">25.00</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">25.2</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Limiting indices</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">−5≤<italic>h</italic>≤6, −15≤<italic>k</italic>≤15, 0≤<italic>l</italic>≤14</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">−11≤<italic>h</italic>≤11, −17≤<italic>k</italic>≤17, 0≤<italic>l</italic>≤15</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Reflections collected</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">2434</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">3890</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Independent reflections</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">2385</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">1248</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>R</italic>
<inf loc="post">int</inf>
</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">0.0505</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">0.0639</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Data/restraints/parameters</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">2385/1/165</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">1248/0/83</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Goodness-of-fit on <italic>F</italic>
<sup loc="post">2</sup>
</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">1.036</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">1.223</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Final <italic>R</italic>
<inf loc="post">1</inf>, <italic>wR</italic>
<inf loc="post">2</inf>
</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">0.0441, 0.0441</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">0.0507, 0.1005</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">
<italic>R</italic> indices (all data)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">0.0479, 0.1145</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">0.0594, 0.1031</entry>
</row>
<row>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">Largest peak, hole (e<hsp sp="0.25"></hsp>Å<sup loc="post">−3</sup>)</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">1.234, −1.256</entry>
<entry xmlns="http://www.elsevier.com/xml/common/dtd">0.932, −0.972</entry>
</row>
</tbody>
</tgroup>
</ce:table>
clean_text:
Table 1. Crystal data, data collection and structure refinement parameters for 1 and 2

| Compound | [HgI2(tmp)]<sup>n</sup> (1) | [HgI2(azobpy)]<sup>n</sup> (2) |
|----------|----------------------------|-------------------------------|
| Formula  | C13H14HgI2N2                | C10H8HgI2N4                    |
| Formula weight | 652.65               | 638.59                        |
| Temperature (K) | 293(2)               | 291(2)                        |
| Crystal system | monoclinic            | orthorhombic                   |
| Space group | P21                      | Pnma                           |
| a (Å) | 5.0811(10)                    | 8.581(2)                       |
| b (Å) | 13.412(3)                     | 13.943(3)                      |
| c (Å) | 12.121(2)                     | 11.954(2)                      |
| a (°) | 90                            | 90                              |
| β (°) | 90.21(3)                      | 90                              |
| γ (°) | 90                            | 90                              |
| V (Å<sup>3</sup>) | 826.0(3)           | 1430.3(5)                      |
| Z      | 2                            | 4                               |
| ρ calc (Mgm<sup>−3</sup>) | 2.624    | 2.966                          |
| μ (mm<sup>−1</sup>) | 13.040          | 15.062                         |
| F(000) | 584                          | 1128                            |
| Crystal size (mm) | 0.22×0.18×0.16     | 0.28×0.20×0.17                  |
| Crystal color | yellow                 | red                             |
| Diffractometer | R-axis-IV              | R-axis-IV                       |
| λ (Mo Kα) (Å) | 0.71073                 | 0.71073                         |
| 2θ max (°) | 25.00                      | 25.2                            |
| Limiting indices | −5≤h≤6, −15≤k≤15, 0≤l≤14 | −11≤h≤11, −17≤k≤17, 0≤l≤15     |
| Reflections collected | 2434           | 3890                            |
| Independent reflections | 2385        | 1248                            |
| R int | 0.0505                       | 0.0639                          |
| Data/restraints/parameters | 2385/1/165 | 1248/0/83                       |
| Goodness-of-fit on F<sup>2</sup> | 1.036 | 1.223                          |
| Final R1, wR2 | 0.0441, 0.0441          | 0.0507, 0.1005                  |
| R indices (all data) | 0.0479, 0.1145   | 0.0594, 0.1031                  |
| Largest peak, hole (eÅ<sup>−3</sup>) | 1.234, −1.256 | 0.932, −0.972          |
